item.title: More apparent flytipping at bins, 6th July
item.description:
The bins outside big Marchwood have a lot of material dumped next to them from a flat renovation, including a bath. Is this flytipping or am I missing some information about legitimate waste removal for this sort of thing?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marchwood Close, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 5th July
item.description:
This vehicle has been there for several months now. The bumper was damaged but hanging down, now it’s completely detached and became a driving hazard for other cars driving on the street. Please review the case as a matter of urgency as it has been already raised for investigation over a month ago.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Middle Park Avenue, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
